title: Classic Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk milk, egg, and butter in another bowl.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake, cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

title: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over dough.
Sprinkle mozzarella and add basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.

title: California Sushi Roll
steps: Cook sushi rice and let it cool.
Place nori on a bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add avocado, crab, and cucumber in a line.
Roll tightly using the mat.
Slice into 8 pieces and serve with soy sauce.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Whisk eggs with parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta, then add egg mixture off heat.
Stir quickly to create a creamy sauce, serve immediately.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop romaine lettuce, place in a large bowl.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and lemon juice.
Toss to combine, season with black pepper.
Serve immediately.

title: Classic Cheeseburger
steps: Form ground beef into a patty, season with salt and pepper.
Grill or cook patty on a skillet for 3-4 minutes per side.
Place cheese on patty during the last minute to melt.
Toast burger bun lightly.
Assemble with mayonnaise, lettuce, tomato, and patty, then serve.

title: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan, sauté onion until soft.
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in coconut milk and tomatoes, simmer for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

title: Berry Smoothie
steps: Add berries, banana, yogurt, orange juice, and honey to a blender.
Blend until smooth, about 1 minute.
Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
